name: Dead Weight (TopHatMan215)
description:
Welcome to Dead Weight!

Your objective is to get Jeremy the weight out of the maze without getting killed by the guards. The problem is, you're tied to Jeremy so you can't move too far away from him. Thankfully, you're strong enough to pick him up! The problem with that is you can't shoot while you're holding Jeremy.

Escape the maze and don't die.

Controls (READ THESE!):

  • WASD to move
  • Space to Jump
  • E to pick up Jeremy (you have to be very close to him)
  • E to put down Jeremy (you have to be looking at the floor nearby)
  • Hold Left click to shoot
  • 1 to Equip Rifle
  • 2 to unequip
